column5: Before I order this rod I was wondering if someone here had a gently used one or a new one they are not using. I have a few GLX loomis rods for trade (Bass) I have a couple of newer GLX rods that have never been used including the Crankbait one. . Or will buy outright.  http://products.gloomis.com/gl/products/fl...D=1234570192580
man you should have came down my way where the loomis  supplier was they where like giving stuff away couple guys i was talking to got $700 rods for like $100 was going to go my self but never did.
